Role – Sr. Java Full Stack Developer
Location – Fort Worth, TX - Onsite
Duration: Long Term
Need only Local for F2F Interview
Job Description: Responsibilities
React Js Experience
8+ years of Core Java development experience, familiar with Java 8 or higher.
Java Full stack engineers with UI, and backend skillsets using Java, JavaScript’s, and React Framework
Apache Spark developer with Java/Scala (Building reusable framework and toolsets for DQ, Realtime Streaming and Batch data process and data ingestion)
General support resource with Hadoop and database skills
Able to deliver end to end project.
Experience with java development and aware of java patterns.
Experience in Spring Boot uses for development.
Experience of development project and developed functionalities using java, j2ee.
Must have AWS experience.
AWS services (S3, SQS, SNS,ECS, Lambda, AWS Cloud watch etc.)
Experience on AWS deployed application.
Experience on Oracle or Postgres or DynamoDB to perform SQL.
Agile/scrum development experience.
Good collaboration and communication skills.
Ready to learn new technologies and perform POC on it.
Ability to diagnose prod issues and defects.
